content.p: Exploring and improving public policy for policymakers, practitioners and the public. Sustainable societies must address complex economic, environmental, political, social and technological challenges. Our responses to these challenges raise key questions about how we should govern ourselves, how and why public policies are formulated, and what influences their delivery. Our research and evaluation provides UK and international policymakers, practitioners and the public with the knowledge and understanding of how their decisions will influence events in a rapidly changing world. About our research
